input: Why was the war game a success ? [SEP] I was very irritated at myself for being exhausted , which is not productive and got people to think that I was pissed at them . Sorry about that . During the Wreath meeting , a war was started and conceded , which I think was very cool . These last few years I ' ve seen too many battles with unequal numbers and it gets old pretty quick . [SEP]
options: Each side had men and women on it .
Neither side would concede .
Each side had equal numbers .
None of the above choices .
